column45: Day 1 - Aruchi: Do you experience lack of desire towards food even after feeling hungry?

column51: Day 1 - Klama: Do you experience any kind of unexplained tiredness without doing any physical work?
column52: Day 1 - Bala Bramsha: Do you get easily exhausted while performing your daily chores?

column555: Murdha-shudhi (Lightness of head without any discomfort)
column558: Swasthtaa (Decreased intensity of disease - After effect)
column559: Manah-prasada (Feeling more happy and contented - After effect)
column560: Apravruti/keval aushadha pravruti (cessation of emesis or expulsion of medicine only)
column562: Sroto-avishudhi (Absence of clarity of channels/ Bahya srotas - External Orifices- to be considered for immediate effect)
column563: Hridaya-Avishudhi (discomfort in chest region and flanks)
